comments:
I've been using the workspace for quite a while, and just noticed that the
scroll bar doesn't line-up with the number of items in the tree.  Checking the
logs, I see an AssertionFailedException.  The StructuredViewer is complaining of
a null argument.

This leaves the tree in an interesting state (I'll attach a screenshot).

Created an attachment (id=7779)
Image of the corrupted workbench window

Notice that the scroll bar indicates more items than are really in the tree.

Doug, this stack trace is coming from PDE's XMLOutlinePage and is apparently 
unrelated to the Package Explorer scroll bar problem.

The XMLOutlinePage's content provider should not be returning null elements.

Moving this one to PDE.  I suggest opening a separate problem against JDT UI 
for the package explorer scroll bar problem.
*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 47379 ***
